citations.narrative:
The squirrel enclosure has an accumulation of food and fecal debris that needs to be removed more frequently from the
primary enclosure. Currently the enclosure is only being cleaned once a month which is not enough to reduce odors,
minimize hazards such as diseases and feeding of pests. This enclosure needs to be cleaned on a more frequent basis to
reduce this accumulation for the health of the squirrel.
Correct by: July 23, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.131(a) 
   
Sanitation. 
The squirrel enclosure has an accumulation of food and fecal debris that needs to be removed more frequently from the 
primary enclosure. Currently the enclosure is only being cleaned once a month which is not enough to reduce odors, 
minimize hazards such as diseases and feeding of pests. This enclosure needs to be cleaned on a more frequent basis to 
reduce this accumulation for the health of the squirrel.  
 
Correct by: July 23, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
